channel.title: CVE Feed for Red Hat -- Fuse
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Red Hat -- Fuse

item.title: CVE-2016-8653|2024-08-06T02:27:41.292Z -- red%20hat -- fuse
item.description: It was found that the JMX endpoint of Red Hat JBoss Fuse 6, and Red Hat A-MQ 6 deserializes the credentials passed to it. An attacker could use this flaw to launch a denial of service attack.
